## Ferritin

Protein utilities for Rust
:::

::::


** Please note that ferritin is alpha-stage software and can change it's API at any time **

## Crates

### Ferritin-Core

Data structures and algorithims to work with proteins. [rust-docs](https://zachcp.github.io/ferritin/doc/ferritin_core/). [source](https://github.com/zachcp/ferritin/tree/main/ferritin-core).

### Ferritin-Bevy

Visualization of proteins using the Bevy animation engine. [rust-docs](https://zachcp.github.io/ferritin/doc/ferritin_bevy/index.html). [source](https://github.com/zachcp/ferritin/tree/main/ferritin-bevy).

### Ferritin-Pymol

Native Rust access to pymol `pse` binary files.  [rust-docs](https://zachcp.github.io/ferritin/doc/ferritin_pymol/index.html). [source](https://github.com/zachcp/ferritin/tree/main/ferritin-pymol).

### Ferritin-MolViewSpec

Utilities for consuming and creating [molviewspec files](https://molstar.org/mol-view-spec/).  [rust-docs](https://zachcp.github.io/ferritin/doc/ferritin_molviewspec/index.html). [source](https://github.com/zachcp/ferritin/tree/main/ferritin-molviewspec).

### Ferritin-Amplify

Inference using amplify. [rust-docs](https://zachcp.github.io/ferritin/doc/ferritin_amplify/index.html). [source](https://github.com/zachcp/ferritin/tree/main/ferritin-amplify).

### Ferritin-LigandMPNN

Inference using proteinmpnn/ligandmpnn. [rust-docs](https://zachcp.github.io/ferritin/doc/ferritin_ligandmpnn/index.html). [source](https://github.com/zachcp/ferritin/tree/main/ferritin-ligandmpnn).
